definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: He spent his golden years traveling to many parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他通過周遊世界度過了晚年的幸福時光。

sentences.english: We'll travel round the world and we'll stay at the best hotels.
sentences.chinese: 就去周遊世界，並且往最好的旅館。

sentences.english: Thumbling, however, declined, and said he wanted to see the world first.
sentences.chinese: 大拇哥謝絕了，說自己想先周遊世界。

sentences.english: A: To retire and travel around the world.
Thee Robinsons love seeing the world.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜一家喜歡周遊世界。

sentences.english: Help Candice as she travels the world, learning and mastering divine new recipes.
sentences.chinese: 幫助王紅，她周遊世界，學習和掌握新的神聖的食譜。

sentences.english: Where is John? He's on a trip to Shanghai. He'll make a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 約翰在哪裏？他去上海旅行楽他將周遊世界。

sentences.english: Glen spent a small fortune on a tour round the world。
sentences.chinese: 格倫花了一筆小錢周遊世界。

sentences.english: He was traveling around the world for months on end.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月來他馬不停蹄地周遊世界。

sentences.english: Hannigan, free tour to all the ports in the world.
sentences.chinese: 漢尼根，免費周遊世界上所有的港口。

sentences.english: He vainly hope to travel round the world on foot.
I'll sit in my wife's handbag and travel the world with her.
sentences.chinese: 我將坐在我的妻子的手提袋裏周遊世界與她。

sentences.english: Two years later, he did indeed go on a round-the-world tour.
sentences.chinese: 兩年以後，他果然去周遊世界了。

sentences.english: Do you dream of travelling the world and having adventures?
sentences.chinese: 你夢想周遊世界冒險闖蕩嗎？

sentences.english: Hannigan, free tour to most of the ports in the world.
sentences.chinese: 漢尼根，收費周遊世界上悉數的港口。

sentences.english: I've been making enquiries into the cost of a round-the-world ticket.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在打聽買一張周遊世界的票需花多少錢。
